rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with north-facing design following Vastu principles for positive energy.
Open-plan living area that maximizes natural light, Scandinavian minimalism with warm wood accents.
Seating space adjacent to the kitchen, designed for comfortable family meals and gatherings.
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with efficient layout adhering to local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom with ensuite bathroom for restful sleep, featuring Scandinavian style minimalism.
Cozy guest bedroom designed to maintain privacy and comfort with access to a small balcony.
Flexible additional bedroom space for family or home office use, following Vastu principles of balanced energy flow.
Dedicated private gym area with adequate space for equipment and exercise, ensuring privacy.

openings.description: Primary entrance facing north, aligning with Vastu principles to bring positive energy.
Windows placed on the east side to maximize morning sunlight and maintain harmony with Vastu norms.
Sliding door providing access to an exterior patio or garden, carefully positioned per Vastu guidelines.
